app_descript:
Minuum Keyboard

Brief: Minuum Keyboard is a revolutionary app designed to enhance your typing experience on touchscreens. With a focus on speed and efficiency, this keyboard offers innovative features that cater to both fast typers and those with larger fingers. Its compact design aims to maximize screen space while still providing easy access to a full-sized keyboard when needed.
